name: Catch the Sun (itch)
description:
Harness solar energy to transform ruined cities into green and growing spaces. Use sun-powered robots, glass flowers, and mirrors to redirect sunlight toward each city's solar collector. 

Remember: rebirth, rejuvenation, and sustainability are always possible.

This is a point-and-click puzzle game; use the mouse to select options from the toolbar on the right side of the screen, and to place items within a city.

Submission to Godot Wild Jam #38 (https://godotwildjam.com/), with the theme "Solarpunk". This is my first game jam and first experience with Godot, so any suggestions and feedback are highly appreciated!
